events.message: I want to request a refund for my recent order because the product did not meet my expectations and I am very disappointed.
The issue was reviewed and categorized under the Refund cluster based on keywords indicating a refund request.
An agent has been assigned to handle the refund request and will be reaching out to provide further assistance.
Hello! I’m here to help you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the refund?
Could you please share your order details and explain why you would like to return the product?
My order number is 123456789. The item was not as described, the color was different and the size was incorrect.
We can process a full refund once you return the product to us. I’ll send you the return shipping label and instructions shortly.
Thank you for your quick response. I appreciate the assistance and will send back the item as soon as I get the label.
We have received your returned product and issued the refund to your original payment method. Please allow 3-5 business days for processing.
Just checking in to confirm that your refund has been received and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since your refund issue has been successfully resolved and no further concerns were raised, we are closing this case now.
